API OverviewÔÉÅ

Below is the list of all functions available in py-graspi:

graspi_igraph.csvFileMaker.csvMaker

Runs multiple graph-related functions, records their runtime and memory usage, and stores the results in a CSV file.

graspi_igraph.csvFileMaker.functionMemory

Measures the peak memory usage of a function during its execution.

graspi_igraph.csvFileMaker.functionRuntime

Measures the average runtime of a function over a specified number of executions.

graspi_igraph.igraph_testing.generateGraph

Constructs a graph from an adjacency list and assigns vertex colors.

graspi_igraph.igraph_testing.filterGraph

Filters the graph by keeping only edges between vertices of the same color.

graspi_igraph.igraph_testing.visual2D

Visualizes the graph in 2D.

graspi_igraph.igraph_testing.visual3D

Visualizes the graph in 3D.

graspi_igraph.descriptors.descriptorsToTxt

Writes graph descriptors to a text file.

graspi_igraph.testFileMaker.testFileMaker

Creates a text file containing a structured grid of binary values based on the given parameters.
